title: Gering City Band performing Thursday
maintext:
The Gering City Band, directed by Randy Reines, director of band for Gering High School, will perform its first “Concert in the Park,” of the summer, Thursday, June 22.
The concert will be held at 7:30 p.m. in Gering’s Legion Park. The band is in its 120+ year of performing band music for area audiences, and ages of the members range from 13 years to over 87. The 70-member band will be performing several popular marches by Sousa and other march composers as well as music based on American folk songs, big band jazz, patriotic tunes and movie music from composers such as John Williams and Elmer Bernstein.
